hamudakarana pilibadawa ambika sathgunanadan wisin liyu lipiyaka, hamudakarana pilibadawa ‚Äòsinthiya enloge‚Äô uputa dakwamin mese liyayi.(mema kotasa pariwarthanaya ‚Äòyahapalanaya lanka‚Äô) ‚Äò‚Äòhamudakarana yanu yam samajayak hamudawa magin piyawaren piyawarata nathukaraganu labana, hamudawak matha yapena thaththwayata samajayak pathkaranu labana saha aayathanayak washayen ho upamanayak washayen hamudamaya purushartha uraganimakata polambaawana, samaja thaththwayaki.

//ee kiyanne wasara panahak pura me ratata bihiwu eda oba menma wiplawa kala dahas sankhyatha widudarayan rate gatalu walata wisadum sewiya yuthuya// wishwa widyala wala asse yatharthaya gana nodanna madhyama panthikayan godak aya hithagena inne meke aya pelapali yanne satan karanne age amaruwata kiyala.aththa.samahara satan wala nam harayak naha thamayi.namuth boho satan athiwenne sadharana prashna uda.oya dannawada danne naha udeta lekchars gihin rata sikiyuriti kam karala wiyadam piyawaganna mesan wada karala salli hoyaganna lamayi wishwa widyala wala innawa.godak wi widyala wala awama pahasukam wath naha.eeye pereda maharajage aanduwa gahala elawapu sama saukhaya pitaye prashne dannawada?ee lamayi thiyari serama igena gena.eeth praktikal karanna ispirithala walata yanna denne naha.eyalawa mekata badawagaththa baladharin dakke naha wage innawa.ee asse kos eka awurudu 3ta bassala gunathwaya adu karanna yanawa.mewata wiruddawa parata bahinne nathiwa wena karanna deyak thiyanawada?ape rate prashne mekayi.thamanta prashnayak nowana dewal "prashna" widihata ganna kawuruth sudanam naha.anith ayata thiyana prashna wala barapathalakama hadunaganna kisi wayamak naha.nikam wiwechanaya nokara me siduwim wala athula diha ebila balanna.ethakota thereyi hithagena inna deta wadi yamak athule thiyanawa kiyala.

aththatama blogin kiyanne sima mayim nathiwa adahas huwamaru kara gatha haki nuthana janasanniwedanaya .meka nisa sampradayika madhya ramuwa thula hira una adahas gala yame awahiratha duru una.wade thiyenne meka wandurata dali pihiya hamba una wage bhawitha nokara antharjala aacharadharma walata garu karamin pawichchi kirimayi.udaharanayak widihata kenekuta waidya widyawa gana lipiyak thamunge blog adawiyata liyanna uwamana nam ee gana danumak nathi kenekuta unath gugal margayen me gana karunu hoyala lipiyak liyanna puluwan.wade thiyenne ehema kalama thamun karunu hoya gaththu mulashra thamunge blog kiyawannange dana ganima pinisa dakwana eka thamayi piliwetha.ehema nathuwa samanyapelatawath widyawa nokarapu ekek wedek nathnam dokek widihata propayil ekak atogena thamunge karunu wage mewa idiripath kalama samanthabadra hamuruwoth rahath wela kiyala piliganna lankawe jahamanaya mewwa is mudunin pili aragannawa.ee witharak nam madayi ara hora weda profayil karayawa pilimayak widihata wandana karannath patan gannawa.meka wedakama gana nemeyi supawedaye sita tharaka widyawa dakwa esemayi.ithin blog karana ewwoth piligath aachara dharma anuwa katayuthu karanawa nam balana ewwoth sihi buddhiyen wimasala kiyola ledak hadunama blog post ekakin neme piligath waidyawarayekugen prathikara gannawa nam kisi prashnayak naha.
